                # æ‰‹å†™Promise

                æ‰‹å†™promiseçš„è¿‡ç¨‹

                1. å½“æˆ‘ä»¬new Promiseæ—¶éœ€è¦ä¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªexecutoræ‰§è¡Œå™¨ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå™¨å¯ä»¥ç«‹å³æ‰§è¡Œ
                2. executoræ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•° resolve å’Œ reject
                3. promiseçš„çŠ¶æ€åªèƒ½ä»pendingåˆ°resolveæˆ–è€…åˆ°reject
                4. promiseçš„çŠ¶æ€ä¸€æ—¦æ”¹å˜å°†ä¸èƒ½å†æ”¹å˜
                5. promiseéƒ½æœ‰thenæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œthenæ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯promiseçš„æˆåŠŸå›è°ƒonFulfilledå’Œpromiseçš„å¤±è´¥å›è°ƒonRejected
                6. å¦‚æœè°ƒç”¨thenæ—¶ï¼Œpromiseå·²ç»æˆåŠŸï¼Œåˆ™æ‰§è¡ŒonFulfilledï¼Œå¹¶å°†promiseçš„å€¼ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ é€’è¿›å»ï¼Œå¦‚æœpromiseå·²ç»å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ™æ‰§è¡ŒonRejectedï¼Œå¹¶å°†promiseçš„åŸå› ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ é€’è¿›å»ã€‚å¦‚æœæ˜¯è¿˜åœ¨pendingçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œéœ€è¦å°†onFulfilledå’ŒonRejectedå‡½æ•°å­˜æ”¾èµ·æ¥ï¼Œç­‰çŠ¶æ€ç¡®å®šåï¼Œå†ä¾æ¬¡å°†å¯¹åº”çš„å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œï¼ˆå‘å¸ƒè®¢é˜…æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰
                7. promiseå¯ä»¥thenå¾ˆå¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œpromiseçš„thenæ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªpromise
                8. å¦‚æœthenè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç»“æœï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±ä¼šæŠŠè¿™ä¸ªç»“æœä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œä¼ é€’ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªthençš„ä¼ é€’ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªthençš„æˆåŠŸçš„å›è°ƒ(onFulfilled)
                9. å¦‚æœ then ä¸­æŠ›å‡ºäº†å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±ä¼šæŠŠè¿™ä¸ªå¼‚å¸¸ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œä¼ é€’ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªthençš„å¤±è´¥çš„å›è°ƒ(onRejected)
                10. å¦‚æœ then è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªpromiseï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¼šç­‰è¿™ä¸ªpromiseæ‰§è¡Œå®Œï¼Œpromiseå¦‚æœæˆåŠŸï¼Œå°±èµ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªthençš„æˆåŠŸï¼Œå¦‚æœå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå°±èµ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªthençš„å¤±è´¥
                const PENDING = 'pending'
const FULFILLED = 'fufilled'
const REJECTED = 'rejected'
function myPromise(executor) {
    let self = this
    self.status = 'pending'
    self.onFulfilled = []
    self.onRejected = []
    self.value = undefined
    self.reason = undefined
    function resolve(value) {
        if (self.status === PENDING) {
            self.status = FULFILLED
            self.value = value
            self.onFulfilled.forEach(fn => fn())
        }
    }
    function reject(reason) {
        if (self.status === PENDING) {
            self.status = REJECTED
            self.reason = reason
            self.onRejected.forEach(fn => fn())
        }
    }

    try {
        executor(resolve, reject)
    } catch (e) {
        reject(e)
    }
}
myPromise.prototype.then = function (onFulfilled, onRejected) {
    let self = this
    let promise2 = new myPromise((resolve, reject) => {
        if (self.status === FULFILLED) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                try {
                    let x = onFulfilled(self.value);
                    resolvePromise(x, resolve, reject)
                } catch (e) {
                    reject(e)
                }
            })
        } else if (self.status === REJECTED) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                try {
                    let x = onRejected(self.reason)
                    resolvePromise(x, resolve, reject)
                } catch (e) {
                    reject(e)
                }
            })
        } else if (self.status === PENDING) {
            self.onFulfilled.push(() => {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    try {
                        let x = onFulfilled(self.value)
                        resolvePromise(x, resolve, reject)
                    } catch (e) {
                        reject(e)
                    }
                })
            })
            self.onRejected.push(() => {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    try {
                        let x = onRejected(self.reason)
                        resolvePromise(x, resolve, reject)
                    } catch (e) {
                        reject(e)
                    }
                })
            })
        }
    })
    return promise2
}


function resolvePromise(x, resolve, reject) {
    if (x instanceof myPromise) {
        x.then(value => {
            resolve(value)
        }, (reason) => {
            reject(reason)
        })
    }else{
        resolve(x)
    }
}

myPromise.prototype.all = function(array){
    let result=[]
    let index=0//ç”¨æ¥è®°å½•arrayä¸­çš„å€¼æ˜¯å¦æ‰§è¡Œå®Œ
    return new myPromise((resolve,reject)=>{
        function addData(key,value){
            result[key]=value
            index++;
            if(index===array.length){
                resolve(result)
            }
        }
        for(let i=0;i<array.length;i++){
            if(array[i] instanceof myPromise){
                array[i].then(value=>{ addData(i,value)},reason=>{reject(reason)})
            }else{
                addData(i,array[i])
            }
        }
    })
}

module.exports = myPromise

                const myPromise = require('./index')

const promise = new myPromise((resolve, reject) => {
    resolve("win")
})

const promise2 = new myPromise((resolve, reject) => {
    resolve("win2")
})

const test = () => {
    return new myPromise((resolve, reject) => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            resolve("promise1")
        }, 2000)
    })
}

promise.then(value => {
    console.log(value);
    return test()
})
    .then(value => {
        console.log(value);
    })

promise.all([promise, promise2]).then(value => {
    console.log(value);
})

                # é˜²æŠ–èŠ‚æµ

                // é˜²æŠ–
function debounce(fn, delay = 300) {
    let timer
    return function () {
        const args = arguments
        if (timer) {
            clearTimeout(timer)
        }
        timer = setTimeout(() => {
            fn.apply(this, args);//æ”¹å˜thisæŒ‡å‘ä¸ºè°ƒç”¨debounceæ‰€æŒ‡çš„å¯¹è±¡
        }, delay)
    }
}

document.getElementById('btn').addEventListener('click', debounce(() => {
    alert("111")
}, 1000))

                // èŠ‚æµ ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶é—´æˆ³
function throttle(fn, delay) {
    var previous = 0;
    return function () {
        let args = arguments
        let now = new Date().getTime()
        if (now - previous > delay) {
            fn.apply(this, args)
            previous = now
        }
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨setTimeoutå®ç°
function throttleSetTimeout(fn, delay) {
    let flag = true
    return () => {
        if (!flag) return
        flag = false
        setTimeout(() => {
            fn()
            flag = true
        }, delay)
    }
}

function blur() {
    console.log(1111);
}

throttle(blur(), 1000)
throttleSetTimeout(blur(), 1000)
